sourcesContent:
Course {{ course.name }} Category {{ course.category }}
import { Course } from './model/course'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.scss'] }) export class CoursesComponent { courses: Course[]; displayedColumns: string[]; constructor() { this.courses = [ {_id: '1', name: 'Angular', category: 'front-end'}, {_id: '2', name: 'React', category: 'front-end'}, {_id: '3', name: 'Vue', category: 'front-end'}, {_id: '4', name: 'Spring Framework', category: 'back-end'}, {_id: '5', name: 'Express', category: 'back-end'}, {_id: '6', name: 'Nest', category: 'back-end'}, ]; this.displayedColumns = ['name', 'category']; } }
